attributes.action: Reduce VAT to 5% on public EV charging
attributes.additional_details:
Many households who have or want an Electric Vehicle (EV) are left with no option but to use public charging as their household has no way to install a home charger, leaving them with the inflated prices of public charging.
 
Home energy is set at a VAT rate of only 5% and feel it is only fair that public charging networks are set at the same rate.
attributes.background: Public EV charging carries a VAT rate of 20%. The UK Government are trying to reach net zero and I believe one way to help achieve this would be to reduce the VAT to 5% on public EV charging.
